result.execSummary:
Michael A Huddleston was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Michael A Huddleston was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael A Huddleston

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Attorney Vincent Paul Guimont in court, defendant Michael A Huddleston not in court, in custody.  Timothy J. Cotter appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Defendant was picked up and placed into Louisiana custody.
Court ordered case "administratively closed".

Attorney Vincent Paul Guimont in court, defendant Michael A Huddleston not in court, in custody.  Timothy J. Cotter appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Governor's warrant has been served on the defendant for extradition to Louisiana.
Statements made.
Case adjourned to 03-27-2015 at 8:30 AM - Br. 2, Judge Donald's Court for Status Conference.

Defendant Michael A Huddleston in court with attorney Vincent Paul Guimont.  
Defendant Michael A Huddleston in custody.  
Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  

Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Donald, Branch 2
Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause.  
Defendant advised of rights and right to file a Writ of Habeas Corpus.  
Court found the defendant is the person wanted in the State of Louisiana.
Defendant contested extradition.  
Court ordered Defendant REMANDED into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.  Status conference scheduled for March 18, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Michael A Huddleston
Current: 6140 N 40th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53209   (Effective: 03-09-2015)
Prior: 3007 North 24th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53212
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
